title: Heart Disease Chatbot
content:
Table of Contents Introduction Proposed Model Overview System Architecture Agent interaction Installation Evaluation Introduction In this project undertaken for the Introduction to Machine Learning and Data Mining course, we address the critical issue of providing accurate and timely health information on cardiovascular diseases. Utilizing the power of Machine Learning and Natural Language Processing, we aim to develop a conversational query model that simplifies access to vital information for users, potentially improving health outcomes and awareness.
Proposed Model Overview Our approach is based on the Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) model, which combines the strengths of document retrieval and generative language models to provide precise answers.
The system architecture integrates a Document Retrieval Module for identifying relevant medical texts (I crawl in Cleveland Clinic ), a Text Retrieval Module that extracts pertinent information, and a Large Language Model (LLM) that synthesizes and delivers user-friendly responses. This model is designed to leverage extensive datasets and pre-trained language models, ensuring high accuracy and relevance in the health advisory domain.
System Architecture The model proposed in the project is a conversational query model that is improved based on the RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) model. This model has the task of retrieving relevant information from the knowledge base to answer user queries. The project model consists of three main components.
Documents retriever: Once the user asks, the model uses the Rank-BM25 library to evaluate and rank the similarity between the user’s query content and the content of 1000 documents in knowledge base. The model then selects the most relevant documents. Chunk retriever: The chunk retriever takes the text chunks that are semantically related to the user’s query from the documents selected from the document retriever. These text chunks are then used to create the context that is fed into the large language model to generate the answer. Large language model (LLM): The large language model uses the context to generate the answer. The project uses three pre-trained large language models: llama-2-7b, mistral-7b and zephyr-7b to compare the results. Agent interaction Installation To install this project, follow these steps:
Clone the repository git clone https://github.com/Dodero10/Heart-Disease-Chatbot.git Set up a environment with Python 3.10 conda create -n chatbot python=3.10 conda activate chatbot pip install -r requirements.txt Download the models ✅ Llama2-7b ✅ Mistral-7b ✅ Zephyr-7b Usage
Start the Chatbot:
streamlit run app.py Demo
Evaluation We evaluate the RAG model based on three aspects:
Faithfulness: refers to the idea that the answer should be grounded in the given context. This is important to ensure that the retrieved context can act as a justification for the generated answer. Answer Relevance: refers to the idea that the generated answer should address the actual question that was provided. Context Relevance: refers to the idea that the retrieved context should be focused, containing as little irrelevant information as possible.

title: Course Condition HUST
content:
Problem Many HUST students are not eligible to take the course in the next semester because they do not complete the required courses. That makes it difficult for students to complete the program on time without following detailed qualifying courses. Keeping track of the conditional course makes students spend a lot of time and can’t observe all of them.
Solution We have put into use this dependent module drawing model to make it easier to track students’ conditional courses.
Operation Source data is downloaded from https://ctt-sis.hust.edu.vn/pub/CourseLists.aspx then analyze the condition information and build the family tree of the modules. Limits: new condition support and, or. Parallel subjects are considered as conditions and.
Usage ver 1: Display all the courses that are dependent on the set of interest. ver 2: Continue tracing to form a full tree branch of dependent modules. ver 3: Displays the course name, number of credits, tuition credits, and weights at the end of the semester. *If no graphs are displayed, the set code does not exist in the database. You can use it at: http://sinno.soict.ai/dkhp.html Prize We were fortunate to get the third prize in the contest “HIGH APPLICATION MVP PRODUCTS CONTEST 2022” organized by SVMC (Samsung Vietnam Mobile R&D Center) and SOICT. This reward is also a motivation for us to develop this product even better

title: Latex Test
content:
Giá trị của biểu thức $\sqrt{x^2 + y^2}$ là khoảng cách từ điểm đến gốc tọa độ.
Đây là một công thức inline: ( a^2 + b^2 = c^2 )
Và đây là một block công thức: [ E = mc^2 ]
$$$$
